ff_optimum.user_packages.reaxff.visualize package¶

Submodules¶

ff_optimum.user_packages.reaxff.visualize.plot_results module¶

ff_optimum.user_packages.reaxff.visualize.plot_results.plot_reaxff_results(package_settings: dict, plot_information: dict, calculated_values: dict, training_data: dict, output_directory: str) → None¶

Plot the calculated results of ReaxFF

Parameters:
  • package_settings – package settings
  • plot_information – scantype and the x axis values
  • calculated_values – ReaxFF computed values
  • training_data – DFT training data
  • output_directory – directory for saving the plot
Returns:
Return type:

None

ff_optimum.user_packages.reaxff.visualize.print_results.print_formation_energy_header() → None¶

Print the header of formation energy

Parameters:None –
Returns:
Return type:None
ff_optimum.user_packages.reaxff.visualize.print_results.print_formation_energy_one_mol(molecule_name: str, composition: str, trial: float, target: float, error: float) → None¶

Print the formation energy of one molecule

Parameters:
  • molecule_name – Name of the molecule
  • composition – Composition of calculating the formation energy
  • trial – Formation energy computed by ReaxFF values
  • target – Formation energy computed by DFT training data
  • error – the difference between the trial and target
